questions.subject: Education
questions.question: What is your favorite class at Lehigh?
questions.answer: Finance 125 because it helped me connect the dots between the corproate accounting classes I took, and the real-world value of financial instruments like stocks and bonds.

questions.subject: Work
questions.question: Tell me about a professional exprience where you had to work on a team.
questions.answer: Claudius AI - we are redesigning the entire front-end preparing for launch, therefore we have a bunch of small tasks to work out

questions.subject: Personal
questions.question: What are your favorite hobbies?
questions.answer: Over the last few months I've been training as an olympic weightlifter, with the goal to compete at the national level someday. I always viewed sports as a way to escape the stress and nonsense of my personal life, and the gym is a place where I can full zone out all my problems.

questions.subject: Work
questions.question: What is your current position?
questions.answer: Software Development @ Claudius AI. We are working on developing a platform, claudius.scholar.ai, that helps make the publishing process easier for scholarly law journals.

questions.subject: Eduation
questions.question: What are you studying at Lehigh?
questions.answer: I'm majoring in the CSB (Computer Science and Business) program, and additionally minoring in Data Science with a concentration in finance. My goal is to develop an education that can support a variety of career paths, which gives me flexibility to truly find a job I love.
